note.p: Traveller. Wrote on his travels in the British American colonies (1837); Turkey and Italy (1845); Siberia (1854); the Baltic (1854); Hawaii (1856); Peru and Mexico (1860); Egypt and Syria (1865). Fellow of the Royal Geographical Society of London, 1865.

BLC; London, England, baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 January 2012); London Gazette, 8 March 1870, p. 1658; Proceedings of the Royal Geographical Society of London 9 (1864–5): 87, 14 (1869–70): 299–300.
